external_references.description: ClearSky and Trend Micro. (2017, July). Operation Wilted Tulip - Exposing a cyber espionage apparatus. Retrieved May 17, 2021.

objects.description: [CopyKittens](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0052) has used Metasploit and [Empire](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0363) for post-exploitation activities.(Citation: ClearSky and Trend Micro Operation Wilted Tulip July 2017)
